channel.title: ITB Tech Talks
channel.description: Short talks introducing current technology and libraries (python/R) useful for Theoretical & Computational Biology.

item.title: 01 - A quick introduction to git
item.description: We are facing a reproducibility crisis in Computational Biology and Theoretical Biology. A key tool to make scientific research reproducible, allow cooperative work on files and versioning of resources are version control systems. This talks will give a short introduction to git, a free and open source distributed version control...
